title: Migawari Accidents
original_name: みがわりアクシデンツ
sinopse:
Saenai Ken is an actor that doesn't sell well. Upon being scouted by the agency "Global = Trouble Agency", he grabs the opportunity, hoping to make a breakthrough. But being a "scapegoat" for the customers wasn't in his plans, though.

[Written by orithyea]
